signals.problem_statement: Managing incoming emails through multiple group and individual email addresses is becoming increasingly difficult as the volume of leads grows.
signals.customer_ask: We want to better manage the emails that come in on the sales side.
signals.suggested_solution: A unified inbox type solution where replies can be sent from individual email addresses while managing group emails.
signals.context: Team of 10 managing multiple email addresses for sales and customer service.

signals.problem_statement: There is a lack of automation in assigning emails to team members based on specific criteria, leading to inefficiencies.
signals.customer_ask: We want emails addressed to specific individuals to be automatically assigned to them.
signals.suggested_solution: Set up conditions for automatic assignment based on the content of incoming emails.
signals.context: Team of 10 managing multiple email addresses for sales and customer service.

signals.problem_statement: The current email management process lacks visibility and tracking, making it hard to ensure all emails are addressed.
signals.customer_ask: We need a way to track how we are responding to emails and ensure nothing slips through the cracks.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement a system that provides visibility into email handling and response tracking.
signals.context: Team of 10 managing multiple email addresses for sales and customer service.

signals.problem_statement: There is no existing feature for AI to act as a support agent, which limits efficiency in handling initial customer inquiries.
signals.customer_ask: We are looking for a chatbot functionality that can handle initial responses before escalating to a human.
signals.suggested_solution: Develop a feature where AI can draft responses and only escalate to a human if necessary.
signals.context: Team of 10 managing multiple email addresses for sales and customer service.
